website_summaries.verdict: Effective sanitizing action, generous portion, and trusted brand make these large pump bottles an excellent choice.
pros: Alcohol-based gel formula works quickly and absorbs into skin quickly
2 large pump bottles - 4 liters - ideal for refilling smaller bottles or using in areas with lots of people, such as classrooms
cons: Alcohol formula can be drying to the skin

customer_reviews.title: An OCD's Dream
customer_reviews.text: The main ingredient in all these hand sanitizers, is isopropyl alcohol. If you just used used a bottle of that, it would be effective, but drying. I look for the highest percentage of this ingredient, in a more forgiving gel. I used to search for Ecolab, but Purell has 70% v/v as opposed to 62%. The gel is light - rub it in for a few seconds to let it do its job! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: IrishMary24

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff, huge quantity, fair price.
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff, huge quantity. Higher alcohol content than off brands. Nice citrus scent. It arrived and I filled up my small bottles before I realized that now I'm retired, and no longer seeing hundreds of students everyday....I don't need this much. I used to try to find these quantities at the local chain pharmacies-- they were always out. If you need this much, don't bother, just order it.
customer_reviews.author: W. N.

customer_reviews.title: Bought for school but they say it stains the floors!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son's school but they said this type of sanitizer can stain the floors and the janitors won't allow it. If you are looking for LARGE sanitizers I assume it will be for a school or office setting and staining the floors would probably be a big drawback.
customer_reviews.author: AFB

customer_reviews.title: Good product with good price.
customer_reviews.text: I saw nurses used this sanitizer in hospital when I delivered my baby in the hospital. So I thought it is reliable. Right now I use it every time before handling baby's sanitized bottles. The price here seems the lowest among other retailer and online stores. I filled it into small bottles for every place I could use it. It's odorless, and dry fast after applied. Pretty handy and useful.
customer_reviews.author: Jia

customer_reviews.title: Unscented..
customer_reviews.text: I bought a generic brand and got three bottles for the price of these two but I gave them away. I got a headache every stinking time I used them. With Purell I've had no issues, you smell a bit of alcohol briefly, it evaporates and it's over with. Why do they have to put perfumes in EVERYTHING these days?
customer_reviews.author: bobcat57

customer_reviews.title: Cost Effective Refills
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge germaphobe and have sanitizer bottles in every room of the house for me, the husband, and the kids to use with it being cold season and all. I used to buy the 10 oz bottles at the store constantly for $3 each, but found these jumbo bottles to be more cost effective as refills. I simply refill the smaller bottles with these and they last a long time. I can usually fill about 7 or 8 standard sized sanitizer bottles with one of these. And of course, it is effective at killing germs and keeping us mostly healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Stabler

customer_reviews.title: Good cleaning, but leaks in the heat.
customer_reviews.text: Sheriff’s deputy in Florida. I keep this in my office (my car). It gets hot in Florida and I am guessing the heat is what causes this to leak. Almost every day since I’ve had this in my car, it leaks out of the nozzle then turns into a slightly solid goo type substance and it stained my seat. Good product for cleaning but the bottle design is forcing me to take it out of my car where it will not be used.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: you get a lot for the value of the product. It is the same quality as those you buy from the groceries on smaller quantity. I have a baby so I need a lot of hand sanitizer. I am not even halfway done with the first bottle and I had this for a couple of months now. Great value for the price. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: nogz

customer_reviews.title: Comes in handy when no access to soap and water.
customer_reviews.text: Industrial! Perfect for constant use by many individuals trying to keep the cold and runny noses at bay. One bottle should last most of the winter season, but glad we have two, just in case.
customer_reviews.author: RƋƑ

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I have had these bottles for roughly 2 months now. They seem to last forever. It has proven to be a solid investment. The pump bottle works great for when your holding something (i.e. a baby) and only have one arm and hand available to reach out and sanitize. Buying it this way also seemed to save a little money. I am pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Austin E.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing beats purell.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a name brand snob kinda girl but I will never use a different brand of hand sanitizer. The others smell funny and leave a weird coating in your hand. I was tired of buying small bottles at a time so I went with these big boys. I probably have enough to last for years but I'm okay that. We use this after diaper changes.
customer_reviews.author: MommyAlpaca

customer_reviews.title: Love the size of these containers
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of these containers. My daughters class asks for sanitizer and these were perfect. I also have these at home.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy to 3 Boys_1 Girl

customer_reviews.title: Other Purell Products are much, much better
customer_reviews.text: This thing sticks to your hands, and does not have a good scent. I purchase and use a lot of Purell products, but this is so far the unarguably worst one among them. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: They are VERY VERY good size for the price I got them
customer_reviews.text: Bottles are intact. They are VERY VERY good size for the price I got them. It is good ole hand sanitizer. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Great quantity for a good price
customer_reviews.text: We go through a LOT of hand alcohol in my household, and believe it or not, buying 4L at a time is apparently the right move. They have moisturizer, so don't leave hands cracked. A+, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Olson

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than Costco Business Center
customer_reviews.text: These are priced cheaper than Costco, even when they are discounted in their coupon books. We use these in our office and to refill the ones in our car. Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Pod Mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: Necessary for living & working around students
customer_reviews.text: This is essential for living next to a college campus. My wife and I go through 2 liters of Purell each year trying to keep from getting sick, since so many students come down with the flu or cold and don’t wash their hands enough.
customer_reviews.author: Phil C.

customer_reviews.title: Disinfects me
customer_reviews.text: Wow, did I over do it. I've been giving it away to the kids for their kids to use. Still have lots left over for me. This will last quite some time before I order next time. I wonder if I can use it as a degreaser too.
customer_reviews.author: Opa Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We feed about 180 meals a day to folks facing homelessness and go through a lot of hand sanitizer. The pump works well.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Used for refill needs; very economical when purchased in bulk like this.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs. I refill my previously-purchased small dispensers, and when purchased in bulk like this the price is far better than the smaller sizes.
customer_reviews.author: LorickR

customer_reviews.title: You can never have too much
customer_reviews.text: New baby in the house so I put one by the door and one in the nursery. I love that the smell isn’t too strong and it doesn’t leave a sticky residue.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Ng

customer_reviews.title: Excelant hand sanitizer
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the other hand sanitizers we have tried. evaporates quickly, and unlike some, doesn't leave a bitter residue on your hands. And, as a added bonus I'm not allergenic to it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Too big size
customer_reviews.text: I use it for more than 7 months, not every day use, still remain half more
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is great stuff and I use it all the time. I was tired of buying small ones all the time, so was the answer. Be careful how you pump, because it pumps a big amount.
customer_reviews.author: T. M.

customer_reviews.title: PURELL,  It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have used Advanced Hand Sanitizer for years, and now I am going to try the Hand Sanitizing Foam. I love their products.
customer_reviews.author: Spider '61

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got when they were on sale,wish I bought two, I put ob my desk at work,EVERYONE uses it,especially now with flu/cold season upon us
customer_reviews.author: JESSICA RHODES

customer_reviews.title: Great price/buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great price/buy! Got tired of going to the local Walmart and buying small containers that seemed pricey and didn't last as long. I got kids and pets, a jug of this helps my household a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Silver22

customer_reviews.title: Have bought a few times.
customer_reviews.text: I love these big bottles. I keep one in my kitchen at all times to use in between hand washing. Also, I fill small bottles that I ve emptied from these bigger bottles. I keep the smaller ones in our vehicles and make my kids disinfect their hands after being in grocery stores ectera. Helpful to have on if one person in the family has flu/is sick.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher G.

customer_reviews.title: They do the job though and teachers were super happy with it
customer_reviews.text: They are huge bottles lol. They do the job though and teachers were super happy with it! It will last a whole school year too hahahah
customer_reviews.author: Lilimoon

customer_reviews.title: Must have for house with new Baby!
customer_reviews.text: With so many people coming in and out of the house visiting our family and new baby, this is a must have and has worked great for us!
customer_reviews.author: LTD

customer_reviews.title: A must need
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to refill the on the go containers around the kitchen and in the bathrooms. Cannot have enough of this hand sanitizer especially with fur babies and kids around.
customer_reviews.author: ReB

customer_reviews.title: Thank goodness
customer_reviews.text: I still have a full bottle, thank goodness,to April 1st 2020.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Contains
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for pure hand sanitizer without any additives. The product description mentioned none. However it came with some skin softener additive to leave your hands soft.
customer_reviews.author: Nozama Customer1

customer_reviews.title: Ocd approved
customer_reviews.text: Yup, big , huge bottles of hand sanitizer. Hmmm, i just need to find a belt attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Trust Me, I Buy a Lot of Stuff!

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind!
customer_reviews.text: I use public transportation a lot and live in a building where I have to touch elevator buttons, public access door handles and stair hand rails. I feel much safer having your product in my home for my own personal use.
customer_reviews.author: Megademon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bringing a baby into a home.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for on my changing table. They are very thin and don’t take up much room. A nice “large” reminder for those coming in our home to sanitize before touching a new baby!
customer_reviews.author: A&F

customer_reviews.title: Lasts a whole school year!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for an amazing price In fact I’m just starting my 2nd bottle And it’s the end of the 1st semester at school...PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.author: Coach Cheers

customer_reviews.title: PURELL Advanced Hand Sanitizer, Refreshing Gel, 2 Liter Table Top Pump Bottles (Pack of 2)
customer_reviews.text: Good 4 a quick clean but don't use as a soap. PURELL Advanced Hand Sanitizer, Refreshing Gel, 2 Liter Hand Sanitizer Table Top Pump Bottles (Pack of 2)
customer_reviews.author: Vincze Gyula Nemes III

customer_reviews.title: Smell is too strong
customer_reviews.text: It’s a hand sanitizer but the smell of the ethanol is overwhelming. It almost knocks you back and won’t go away. Makes you just want to go wash your hands with soap. So maybe it’s a gateway drug to washing your hands.
customer_reviews.author: ATM

customer_reviews.title: Classroom necessity.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my classroom. Smells like hand sanitizer. A full pump is too much for one person.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey.Dettman

customer_reviews.title: its the best of its type I habe used
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for years, its the best of its type I habe used.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P. Zauner

customer_reviews.title: These big bottles last a long time
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t use anything else but Purell. And these big bottles last a long time
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: Not as big a size as they used to be ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as big a size as they used to be. Hubby lives for this stuff. I am allergic because of the alcohol, but he lives on it.
customer_reviews.author: Dinamyt

customer_reviews.title: it works, no awful smell
customer_reviews.text: This is the best hand sanitizer I have used, nice large bottle, and no strong smell. Fast shipment, I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Martin Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: I use them to refill the little bottles. Also great to keep at entry areas to the house
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: nice big bottles of effective sanitizer
customer_reviews.text: Great for refilling smaller bottles or placing in a high traffic area. Alcohol-y smell, slighting drying.
customer_reviews.author: audrey frances

customer_reviews.title: It’s hard finding normal scented sanitizer out there. I ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard finding normal scented sanitizer out there. I put this one for the bathroom and it smells genuine and original. Everyone takes a little squirt. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Eva Sidera

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by our nurse
customer_reviews.text: It works and we can rely on it to keep our hands and the working area sterile.
customer_reviews.author: Gayleonthego

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Large bottles of purell. Does the job, can't ask for more!
customer_reviews.author: Edward Su

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I get these for work, these are huge, and everyone loves them
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: Good sanitizer without drying your skin as much as the cheap brands do.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P. Grotenhuis

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: This bulk pack is good for regularly refilling small bottles taking out daily.
customer_reviews.author: Real Siu

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Don't have to worry about a lot of refills. Easy to use. Drys fast.
customer_reviews.author: RBD 2

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for classrooms
customer_reviews.text: The kids’ teachers love these huge bottles coming in and it’s a better price then buying the smaller ones.
customer_reviews.author: Snupydecat

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper!
customer_reviews.text: Much cheaper than buying the small individual pumps. I use these to those ones up when they get empty.
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Though the delivery is too slow. They separated the delivery into 2 without providing the tracking number and any notification.
customer_reviews.author: Ecilang

customer_reviews.title: What do you really need to know?
customer_reviews.text: 2 jumbo pump containers of Purell are a germaphobe's dream come true 10/10 would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Johnny A

customer_reviews.title: ... these come in handy and the size is beyond perfect. Plus
customer_reviews.text: Owning a group home these come in handy and the size is beyond perfect. Plus, Prime!

customer_reviews.title: Best Deal Around!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS STUFF!!! We have three kids in the house and you could only imagine what they track in with them from outside and other places, so I keep the 2L by the front door and refill the smaller ones around the house. I price checked various stores and this was the lowest price by far!!!

customer_reviews.title: The hand sanitizer was used to make wedding favors
customer_reviews.text: I used the Purell to fill MHO containers for wedding favors

customer_reviews.title: faulty pump
customer_reviews.text: I love the product but one of the pumps refuses to work it is too tight and won't pump.

customer_reviews.title: Great value, shipped quickly and arrived as described
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for! Great value, shipped quickly and arrived as described!

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as expected. No problems at all. Packaged well. High quality product.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value. This stuff is super harsh on the skin so mix with Aloe gel or something

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great price we use them at large events and to refill small bottles

customer_reviews.title: These is a massive amount of hand sanitizer! I ...
customer_reviews.text: These is a massive amount of hand sanitizer! I use it on average, 5 times a week for 30 students, and 4 month later, we are still on the first bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Tia J.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The shipment is satisfactory with good packing. Well received. The quality of sanitizer is nice.
customer_reviews.author: searover

customer_reviews.title: A must have when working around alot of people or money.
customer_reviews.text: One pump has the perfect amount to get both hands.
customer_reviews.author: Mikel D.

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping clean!
customer_reviews.text: Big bottles, both pumps work well with no problems. These have a pretty good smell, it's not overpowering or gross. We will definitely buy again when these run out.
customer_reviews.author: IT Team

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and the value. We have refilled all our bottles around the house many times and it is so great to not run out during cold & flu season! The only downside for us is that it is unscented.
customer_reviews.author: Pam H

customer_reviews.title: Good for refill purpose
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as described. Good for refill purpose. Best price you can ever find on market.
customer_reviews.author: Shiowen

customer_reviews.title: So much hand sanitizer, or han-itizer as my 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: So much hand sanitizer, or han-itizer as my 5 year old calls it. Would buy again...in a year or so after we run out.
customer_reviews.author: Habitat Home & Garden

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: What a deal! Coworkers and I chipped in on the hand sanitizer for the flu season.
customer_reviews.author: Raudy

customer_reviews.title: Portable but bulk
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine, but I ended up having to buy a smaller version to accommodate our use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally - no perfume!
customer_reviews.text: It's become really difficult to find Purell in stores without the fragrance/perfume added, and so we've resorted to making our own. But ounce per ounce, this is actually less expensive, and as it says, it contains no perfumes or fragrances. We use it to refill smaller bottles, and the pump makes this a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: CthulhuTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: You'll never run out of Purell with these large containers ...
customer_reviews.text: You'll never run out of Purell with these large containers. I'd probably use this to refill smaller containers. This pump dispenses a really large volumn so using it as a daily dispenser might be wasteful.
customer_reviews.author: HTTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Deal
customer_reviews.text: I work at an animal shelter and found myself constantly going through smaller bottles like crazy. These things are perfect! Great large size that will last for at least a couple months. Be warned they are drying though, it's pretty much straight sanitizer, not the fancier moisturizing stuff.
customer_reviews.author: JessicaTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: My go to hand sanitizer in plus size!
customer_reviews.text: Use it as a refill fir smaller bottles. At this price you can't go wrong. I can usually get about a year out of one.
customer_reviews.author: comfortable dave

customer_reviews.title: Keep this on my desk at home and work!
customer_reviews.text: This is very good for individuals who don't want to repeatedly wash their hands every 5-10 minutes after touching something dirty!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew L. Kizzie

customer_reviews.title: Great sanitizer
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves purell. Went through 2 bottles in 1 months time. Most economical way to buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Pauling

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: 2 big jugs of sanitizer, perfect to have at the cabin
customer_reviews.author: ryan n.
